casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Calvin Renard CARTER 193PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016 Richard J. Costanza, Attorney at Law, Southern Pines, for Carter, Calvin Renard. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th of July 2016 by Defendant to Deem as Timely Filed the Response to Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
